alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued May 08 at 12:26AM CDT until May 08 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release is possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Illinois, including the following county, Sangamon. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...This release of water will cause rapid rises on Sugar Creek, downstream of the dam. Rapid flooding of low-lying areas along the creek will result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
